text:
@SenMcSallyAZ @POTUS @VP The problem is Dr. Fauci needs to clear everthing he says about the Coronavirus with Pence rather than the other way around.  Again, the @gop & @realDonaldTrump
are interested in hiding information rather than telling the American people THE TRUTH.@gop is the party of LIARS!

entity.name: President Trump puts VP Pence in charge of US response to coronavirus
entity.description: Donald Trump said the risk to the US from the deadly coronavirus “remains very low” and that he has put Vice President Mike Pence in charge of the American response to the outbreak.
